articles.title: Highlights: Germany beat France to reach Euro 2022 final | BBC Sport - BBC Sport
articles.description: Watch highlights as Alexandra Popp leads Germany to a 2-1 win over France to secure their place against England in the final of Euro 2022 at Wembley Stadium ...
